name: Fan Attack (Prototype)
description:
You're famous and you love your fans . . . but sometimes it's just too much! They keep coming to you and you don't want to talk to them right now.

The game will have a humorous story and an arcade like feel.

Check out https://trello.com/b/POZqasLN/fan-attack for my real-time to-do list :)

Feedback I'm looking for:

how to make the game more entertaining

Anything you can think of.

bugs

I hope there aren't any. Yes I know the enemy spawn is not exactly in the right place.

pistol balance

I want players to constantly wonder which gun is better between these two:

The wide starting gun is a .45, should be powerful but not many bullets.

The small dark grey gun is a 9mm, many bullets but low quality bullets.

fast fire rate guns

Originally the game was just going to be 2 pistols but people like variation. These two guns should be equally good as the pistols, just different.

Uzi (yellow gun) tends to jam (not yet), high fire rate but low quality bullets, high bullet capacity.

Then a similar gun to compete with this one (red gun). Maybe higher dmg but slower fire rate. Not sure yet. Or not have this gun.

Turrets

I want to know what kind of auto fire turrets you like (max 1-3 per level). Each would change how you play the game.

The game right now

Right now it's just a test of the physics and guns. Waves of 10 enemies come every so often, that's it. Check out https://trello.com/b/POZqasLN/fan-attack for my real-time to-do list :)

Mouse aim/shoot

Q-E switch weapons

WASD/arrows move
